controller.name: sequence
controller.explanation: execute sub tasks sequentially in a predetermined order to achieve step-by-step completion of complex tasks
controller.synonyms: check that all parts needed for assembly are available
deliver the coffee to the user
pour the liquid into the mug
put the cereal box back in the pantry
fill the container with water from the sink
pour water into the cup of instant ramen
put the instant ramen into the microwave
put coffee beans in the coffee maker
pour water into the coffee maker
get chips and soda from the table
deliver chips and soda to the user
deliver the chips to the user
deliver the cooked egg to the user
Repeat until all trash is cleaned
serve the eggs and coffee to the user
pour drink into the long glass
place the mug with coffee inside the microwave
deliver plates and cups to the user
pour the contents into the bowl
put non-food and drink items on shelves
if not overflowing, continue adding water
repeat until all furniture is moved to the sides of the room
stir mug for half a minute
boil the water on the stove for 10 minutes
place syrup bottles in the refrigerator
put Xbox-related items in the cabinet
pour energy drink into the cup
if halfway full, move to the fridge
serve the egg and the cup
deliver salt shaker to the user
navigate to the channel selection menu
deliver the items to the user
fill the long cup with water
deliver the energy drink to the user
deliver the boiled egg to the user
place the plate with the food item inside the microwave
if water level is less than 80 percent, repeat toggle the tap
deliver coke cans and chips to the user
repeat until all cups are stacked
deliver the items to the designated person
deliver the bowl to the table
place the cup with water inside the microwave
pour soup base into the pot
deliver the ice cream to the user
put all the pillows back on the top shelf
controller.pattern: ^(sequen.*?|progressively).*(execute|step by step|in order|in sequence|carry out|gradually|one by one)$
^(execut.*?|perform.*?|order|operat.*?|implement.*?).*(step by step|in order|in sequence|gradually|one by one)$
